Akvo Foundation | Data intern | Amsterdam, NL | ONSITE, INTERNS

http://akvo.org/about-us/working-at-akvo/

Akvo is looking for a data management and analysis intern for a period of six â€“ eight months. This is an opportunity to gain practical experience working in a purpose-driven organisation. You will work on various data analysis projects, such as: looking at which investments in water infrastructure are most effective; and how data can best be combined and presented to be useful for data-driven decision making.

Akvo Foundation builds open source software that we run as a service for several dozen governments, UN organisations and hundreds of NGOs.
